sentences.en: David Pun as the Macau Seminar's Master of Ceremonies.
sentences.cn: 绰越发展董事潘国梁作为研讨会的主持人.

sentences.en: David Pun sharing different franchising models for developing retail business in China.
sentences.cn: 潘国梁分享在中国发展零售业务可采用的不同[许经营]式.

sentences.en: Elder Pun was a towering figure in my life.
sentences.cn: 潘前人是后学生命中的一位崇高之大人物.

sentences.en: Far be it from me to insult the pun!
He is a master of the pun and the double entendre.
sentences.cn: 他出口就是俏皮话，说话下流不带脏字。

sentences.en: I could be cynical and say he probably did it hoping to make a killing -- pardon the pun -- but for the sake of the higher argument I'll play along.
sentences.cn: 我也许可以玩世不恭的说他这么做是希望开发出一个在市场上“必杀”的游戏——请原谅我的双关语——但为了更高层的论题，我权且同意他的话。

sentences.en: Polysemy, ambiguity, pun are three semantic phenomena which people always concern.
sentences.cn: 多义 、 歧义 、 双关是人们一直关注的三种语义现象.

sentences.en: Pun - type: quipped, both out products, but also has other meaning.
sentences.cn: 双关型: 一语双关, 既道出产品, 又别有深意.

sentences.en: Sur a pun to surprise you with the prize.
sentences.cn: 这里的surprise一语双关,容易引起顾客的注意.

sentences.en: The obvious pun is that Benz sounds like bends.
sentences.cn: 在这个明显的双关语中,[宾士]的发音和[弯曲]很像.

sentences.en: The phrase is a pun on haiwai guilai, meaning returned from overseas.
sentences.cn: 每年,海归数量以成百上千的速度增加.

sentences.en: The pun is the dung of the mind which soars.
sentences.cn: 隐语是飞着的精灵所遗的粪.

sentences.en: The slogan is a pun on the name of the product.
sentences.cn: 那广告用语与其产品名称一语双关。

sentences.en: The slogan was a pun on the name of the product.
sentences.cn: 那广告用语与其产品名称一语双关.

sentences.en: There are two kinds of puns, phonetic pun and semantic pun.
sentences.cn: 双关语分为谐音双关和语义双关两类.

sentences.en: We're banking on them lending us the money—no pun intended!
sentences.cn: 我们正指望他们借给我们钱呢—bank绝无双关之意！

words.tran_cn: 重击；敲打；使用双关语（pun的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: an amusing use of a word or phrase that has two meanings, or of words that have the same sound but different meanings
